name: Mzito Math
description:
THE PROBLEM

Numeracy skills among pupils in Kenya is low. Studies have shown  that about 10% of grade 8 children in Kenya, cannot do basic  numeracy and literacy skills at grade 2 level. (UWEZO 2016 Report).

THE SOLUTION

Mzito Math, a localized digital mobile game where children aged 4 to 10 years old are able to learn numeracy skills in an engaging and interactive manner

The stories and content used will be based on the Mzito Universe .
